name: Curupira (Fiwon)
description:
Welcome to our page!

We are from Brazil, and we wanted to bring some culture in our game, then enjoy that carismatic character of popular folklore called Curupira :).

This is a puzzle game where you must think well before  you act, putting footprints and lead the hunter out of the woods.

Controls:

Enter / Return:  Confirm
ESC:  Back / Open menu in Game
Arrows: Move
Z: Whistle
X: Footprint

Team:

Euler Melo
Felipe Inoue
